name: 鄭瑞清
objective:
The purpose of this class is to introduce linear system design in electrical engineering. The content includes:

1. Linear Algebra
2. MATLAB
3. State Space Solutions and Realizations
4. Stability
5. Controllability and Observability
6. Minimal Realization and Coprime Fractions
7. State Feedback and State Estimators
8. Pole Placement and Model Matching
